PcDocRulesExpr.LValue: QuoteDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;
OrderDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;

PcInputs.SideLabel: Access to all available Part record finish options:
Specifying a Pallet type will auto populate the Pack/Job Comment.

PcInputs.OnLeave2: chk_overridecomments = TRUE. var_packcomment = orderpackcomment. End. End.

PcInputsExpr.Expression: // if Inputs.var_orderdtlpart.Value = Inputs.var_sku.Value and orderpackcomment<>"" and orderpackcomment <> Inputs.var_packcomment.Value then do: //

PcPageExpr.Expression: Inputs.var_upchargecalctotal.Value = Inputs.var_seg1upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg2upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg3upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg4upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg5upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg6upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg7upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg8upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg9upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg10upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg11upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg12upcharge.Value;
